scripts.generate-docs: yarn clean:docs && yarn generate-docs:classes && yarn generate-docs:utils
scripts.generate-docs:classes: typedoc --options typedoc.json --exclude '!**/*(Call|StreamVideoClient).ts' ./index.ts && replace-in-file '# Class: ' '# ' temp-docs/** && cp -a temp-docs/classes/. generated-docs && rm -r temp-docs
scripts.generate-docs:utils: typedoc --options typedoc.json --exclude '!**/*(devices).ts' ./index.ts && replace-in-file '# @stream-io/video-client' '# Utilities' temp-docs/** && cp temp-docs/modules.md generated-docs/utilities.md && rm -r temp-docs
